basics.label: ML & AI Researcher
basics.summary: Results-oriented Machine Learning/AI researcher with strong analytical skills and a focus on deep learning, artificial intelligence, and data science.

work.name: Universitat Pompeu Fabra
work.summary: As a member of the ML & AI Research Group at Universitat Pompeu Fabra, I specialize in developing a deterministic action simulator for sequential decision-making problems utilizing Linearly-solvable Markov Decision Processes (LMDP). My focus lies in optimizing algorithmic performance and scalability, particularly in intricate domains, through the refinement of action selection methods and the enhancement of value function approximation techniques.

awards.title: Recipient of the Honor Roll Recognition
awards.summary: I was placed in the honor roll for my outstanding academic performance in 2018-2019 academic year.

awards.title: Graduated with Honors
awards.summary: American high school graduate with honors, recognized for outstanding academic achievement from 2016 to 2020.

awards.title: Academic Distinction for Exceptional University Entrance Exam Results.
